page.description: Returns a list of security groups defined for the current web project. Used in UX server-side events
page.discussion:
Return a list of security groups defined for the current web project. It has no input parameters and should be used in place of the a5ws_Get_Groups in the V11 Dialog component. Used in the v11 dialog server-side events. It has no input parameters and should be used in place of the a5ws_Get_Groups Function in the V11 Dialog component.
It has no input parameters and should be used in place of the a5ws_Get_Groups in the V11 Dialog component.

see.ref: Return a list of security groups defined for the current project. It has no input parameters and should be used in place of the a5ws_Get_Groups in the V11 Dialog component.
